title: Shield Dwarf
content:
rkvision: See in the dark up to 12m. Dwarven Resilience: Advantage on Saving Throws against Poison, and you have resistance against Poison damage.

Shield Dwarf Tips & Notes

During Early Access, the Shield Dwarf race used to feature +2 Constitution and +2 Strength. This has been changed in the full launch of BG3 and the Ability Score points are now associated with the Class that players will choose.
